text:
BREAKING: OpenAI made prompts for ChatGPT.

9 prompt packs are available, per role:

→ ChatGPT for IT
→ ChatGPT for HR
→ ChatGPT for sales
→ ChatGPT for product
→ ChatGPT for any role
→ ChatGPT for managers
→ ChatGPT for engineers
→ ChatGPT for executives
→ ChatGPT for customer success

To master prompting: https://lnkd.in/duP3Za5W.

To know what people prompt: https://lnkd.in/dGYgcQ_7.

To master gpt-5: https://lnkd.in/gVx_ZPh3.

To set up ChatGPT: https://lnkd.in/dA3FGZjc.

To access prompts from OpenAI: https://lnkd.in/dBZRzdHz.
